1_1DUt2hdvamdyX1LtRC6YqoyUPRqGEJGdYY.body:
> [yee](#comment_2_1LrJ9rZg2Mk2uK8MyPx42iWPEHTLKXzxVn): I disagree, police are good people, it's just the minority that make them seem bad.

LEOs are the enforcement arm of the state.  They are generally immune to laws that the citizens must follow, due to:
* legislative gymnastics
* a willingness to cover for each other
* worshipful bootlicking citizenry.

I do not expect "paradigms of virtue" from LEOs (to paraphrase Bloom).  I would, however, like them to live up to the same standards as the rest of us.
